hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Liquidity Surge Post-BTC Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a BTC breakout above its 20-day Bollinger Band upper bound during BULL regimes, meme coins (DOGE, PEPE, etc.) experience accelerated liquidity inflows, with their aggregate volume increasing ≥150% more than the crypto market average over the next 3 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Retail traders chase momentum after BTC breakouts, with meme coins benefiting disproportionately due to lower entry barriers and social media amplification. This creates measurable liquidity surges that outpace the broader market.
entry_conditions: BTC closes above 20-day Bollinger Band upper bound (2 std dev)
Aggregate meme coin volume 5-day MA increasing
Social sentiment for meme coins spikes (alternative data signal)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Meme coin aggregate volume increases 150% more than total crypto volume
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Meme coin volume underperforms total crypto volume
exit_conditions.time_exit: 3 trading days after BTC breakout confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Meme coin volume fails to outperform total crypto volume by ≥50% in more than 60% of BTC breakout instances during BULL regimes over past 2 years.
